data.name: Salt Lake DevFest
data.description: Salt Lake DevFest is our annual event showcasing the incredible developer talent located here in Salt Lake. We’ll have speakers and workshops from a variety of speakers covering various tech topics. More info to come!

relatedRecords.name: CodeMobile
relatedRecords.description: CodeMobile is a UK developer conference that has been created by developers who love creating apps in the mobile space. It’s an opportunity to network, share ideas and collaborate. The conference has two tracks, one focussed on iOS development, the other on Android.

relatedRecords.description: Mobile & ML DevFest is our annual event showcasing the incredible developer talent located here in Salt Lake.
